eucountries: Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Frank N. Magid Associates and SurveysOnline.com will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints relating to our compliance with the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.  For complaints that cannot be resolved between Frank N. Magid Associates and SurveysOnline.com and the complainant not involving European Union human resources data, Frank N. Magid Associates and SurveysOnline.com has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the American Arbitration Association.  For complaints that cannot be resolved between Frank N. Magid Associates and SurveysOnline.com and the complainant involving European Union related human resources data, Frank N. Magid Associates and SurveysOnline.com has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union data protection authorities.
